title: Elise's Spider Form Quotes Are Not Playing [GAMEPLAY]
body: Recently, I was playing Elise. I immediately transformed to spider form to go fast, but I thought I was in human form for quite a long time (1 min). Then, I realized that the spider form quotes were not being played, even laugh/joke/taunt ones. Instead of spider form quotes, human form quotes were playing. I was totally disappointed. Can you please fix this?

replies.body:
Hey exiledFromBadmen! 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of this issue and are working on a fix!
The issue is being resolved by Riot I believe.
